name: Dumbell
description: Fit-peak Dumbbells are made of solid cast iron with a protective black rubber coating.

name: Barbell
description: Fit-peak Barbell is a long iron bar that is used for weightlifting. It is a standard piece of equipment in most commercial gyms.

name: Kettlebell
description: Kettlebell is a cast iron or cast steel ball with a handle attached to the top (resembling a cannonball with a handle).

name: Weight plate
description: Weight plates are a type of weight training equipment that are used to add resistance to adjustable barbells and dumbbells, as well as plate-loaded weight machines.

name: Resistance band
description: Fit-peak Resistance bands are elastic bands made of latex tubing used for strength training. They are light weight, portable and space saving exercise equipment.

name: Medicine ball
description: Fit-peak Medicine balls are weighted balls that are used to help improve strength, coordination, and balance. They are used for a variety of exercises and are a great tool for rehabilitation from injury.

name: Jump rope
description: Fit-peak Jump rope is a tool used in the sport of skipping/jump rope where one or more participants jump over a rope swung so that it passes under their feet and over their heads.

name: Yoga mat
description: Fit-peak Yoga mat is a specially fabricated mat used as an aid during the practice of hatha yoga to prevent hands and feet slipping during asana practice.

name: Foam roller
description: Fit-peak Foam roller is a lightweight, cylindrical tube of compressed foam. It is used for many myofascial release exercises.

name: Balance ball
description: Fit-peak Balance ball is an exercise ball also known as a Swiss Ball, is a ball constructed of soft elastic with a diameter of approximately 35 to 85 centimeters (14 to 34 inches) and filled with air.

name: Bottle
description: Fit-peak Bottle is a container with a narrow neck that can be used to store and transport water. It is made of plastic and is reusable.

name: Shoes
description: Fit-peak Shoes are a type of footwear specifically designed for sports and physical exercise. They are typically made of flexible materials and feature a sole made of dense rubber.
